short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teleport any webpage to your mobile device via QR-code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this QR-URL extension adds a short-cut button to chrome, which when clicked generates a QR code for the URL you are browsing. So you can easily teleport the current page to other mobile devices!
